name: acey-deucey-game-engine
description: a game engine for the backgammon variant acey deucey

scripts.test: jshint -c .jshintrc get-initial-game-state.js is-game-over.js is-valid-move.js is-valid-turn.js make-move.js make-turn.js tests && tape tests/*.test.js | tap-difflet

author: Katherine Thompson ket29@cornell.edu
